 23/// redim_get and redim_put are helper functions for Redim_block
 24/// They allow a single Redim_block class definition to reduce both
 25/// 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional blocks.
 26template <typename BlockT>
 27typename BlockT::value_type
 28redim_get(BlockT const& blk, index_type l_idx, integral_constant<int, 2>)
 29{
 30  index_type idx[2];
 31
 32  for (dimension_type d=2; d-->0;)
 33  {
 34    idx[d] = l_idx % blk.size(2, d);
 35    l_idx /= blk.size(2, d);
 36  }
 37
 38  return blk.get(idx[0], idx[1]);
 39}
 40
 41template <typename BlockT>
 42void
 43redim_put(BlockT &blk,
 44	  index_type l_idx,
 45	  typename BlockT::value_type value,
 46	  integral_constant<int, 2>)
 47{
 48  index_type idx[2];
 49
 50  for (dimension_type d=2; d-->0;)
 51  {
 52    idx[d] = l_idx % blk.size(2, d);
 53    l_idx /= blk.size(2, d);
 54  }
 55
 56  blk.put(idx[0], idx[1], value);
 57}
 58
 59template <typename BlockT>
 60typename BlockT::value_type
 61redim_get(BlockT const& blk, index_type l_idx, integral_constant<int, 3>)
 62{
 63  index_type idx[3];
 64
 65  for (dimension_type d=3; d-->0;)
 66  {
 67    idx[d] = l_idx % blk.size(3, d);
 68    l_idx /= blk.size(3, d);
 69  }
 70
 71  return blk.get(idx[0], idx[1], idx[2]);
 72}
 73
 74template <typename BlockT>
 75void
 76redim_put(BlockT &blk,
 77	  index_type l_idx,
 78	  typename BlockT::value_type value,
 79	  integral_constant<int, 3>)
 80{
 81  index_type idx[3];
 82
 83  for (dimension_type d=3; d-->0;)
 84  {
 85    idx[d] = l_idx % blk.size(3, d);
 86    l_idx /= blk.size(3, d);
 87  }
 88
 89  blk.put(idx[0], idx[1], idx[2], value);
 90}
 91
 92// The following version of Redim_block appears to cause an ICE with
 93// various versions of G++, notably ppu-g++ 4.1.1, so we fall back
 94// to a version that can't distinguish between modifiable and non-modifiable
 95// versions (and thus needs to const-cast the data-type.
 96#if 0
 97
 98/// Redimension block.
 99///
100/// Provides a 1-dimensional view of a multidimensional block.
101/// Intended for use when a multidimensional block refers to dense
102/// data, but does not support 1,x-dimensional access (for example
103/// a Sliced_block).  Redim_block's direct data interface requires
104/// underlying block to be dense, but get/put work regardless of the
105/// layout.
106template <typename Block,
107 	  dimension_type D, 
108 	  bool Mutable = Is_modifiable_block<Block>::value>
109class Redim_block;
110
111template <typename B, dimension_type D>
112class Redim_block<B, D, false> : Compile_time_assert<D == 2 || D == 3>
113{
114public:
115  static dimension_type const dim = 1;
116
117  typedef typename B::value_type value_type;
118  typedef typename B::reference_type reference_type;
119  typedef typename B::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
120  typedef typename B::map_type map_type;
121
122  typedef typename Block_layout<B>::order_type raw_order_type;
123
124  typedef Storage<typename Block_layout<B>::complex_type, value_type>
125    storage_type;
126  typedef typename storage_type::type data_type;
127  typedef typename storage_type::const_type const_data_type;
128
129  Redim_block(B &block) : blk_(&block) {}
130  Redim_block(Redim_block const &rb) VSIP_NOTHROW : blk_(&*rb.blk_) {}
131  ~Redim_block() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
132
133  value_type get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
134  { return redim_get(*blk_, idx, integral_constant<int, D>());}
135
136  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
137  { return blk_->size();}
138
139  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
140  {
141    assert(block_dim == 1 && d == 0);
142    return blk_->size();
143  }
144
145  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW
146  { return blk_->map_;}
147
148  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
149  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
150
151  const_data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW
152  { return blk_->impl_data();}
153
154  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
155    const VSIP_NOTHROW
156  {
157    assert(block_dim == 1 && d == 0);
158    return D == 2 ?
159      blk_->impl_stride(2, raw_order_type::impl_dim1) :
160      blk_->impl_stride(3, raw_order_type::impl_dim2);
161  }
162
163protected:
164  typename View_block_storage<B>::type blk_;
165};
166
167template <typename B, dimension_type D>
168class Redim_block<B, D, true> : public Redim_block<B, D, false>
169{
170  typedef Redim_block<B, D, false> base_type;
171public:
172  typedef typename base_type::data_type data_type;
173  typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
174
175  Redim_block(B &block) : base_type(block) {}
176
177  void put(index_type idx, value_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
178  { redim_put(*this->blk_, idx, val, integral_constant<int, D>());}
179
180  using base_type::impl_data;
181  data_type impl_data() VSIP_NOTHROW { return this->blk_->impl_data();}
182};
183
184#else
185
186template <typename B, dimension_type D>
187class Redim_block : Compile_time_assert<D == 2 || D == 3>
188{
189public:
190  static dimension_type const dim = 1;
191
192  typedef typename B::value_type value_type;
193  typedef typename B::reference_type reference_type;
194  typedef typename B::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
195  typedef typename B::map_type map_type;
196
197  typedef typename Block_layout<B>::order_type raw_order_type;
198
199  typedef Storage<typename Block_layout<B>::complex_type, value_type>
200    storage_type;
201  typedef typename storage_type::type data_type;
202  typedef typename storage_type::const_type const_data_type;
203
204  Redim_block(B &block) : blk_(&block) {}
205  Redim_block(Redim_block const &rb) VSIP_NOTHROW : blk_(&*rb.blk_) {}
206  ~Redim_block() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
207
208  value_type get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
209  { return redim_get(*blk_, idx, integral_constant<int, D>());}
210  void put(index_type idx, value_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
211  { redim_put(*blk_, idx, val, integral_constant<int, D>());}
212
213  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
214  { return blk_->size();}
215
216  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
217  {
218    assert(block_dim == 1 && d == 0);
219    return blk_->size();
220  }
221
222  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW
223  { return blk_->map_;}
224
225  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
226  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
227
228  data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW
229  { return const_cast_<data_type>(blk_->impl_data());}
230  data_type impl_data() VSIP_NOTHROW { return const_cast_<data_type>(blk_->impl_data());}
231
232  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
233    const VSIP_NOTHROW
234  {
235    assert(block_dim == 1 && d == 0);
236    return D == 2 ?
237      blk_->impl_stride(2, raw_order_type::impl_dim1) :
238      blk_->impl_stride(3, raw_order_type::impl_dim2);
239  }
240
241protected:
242  typename View_block_storage<B>::type blk_;
243};
244#endif
245
246template <typename       BlockT,
247	  dimension_type Dim>
248struct Block_layout<Redim_block<BlockT, Dim> >
249{
250  // Dimension: 1
251  // Access   : Same
252  // Order    : row1_type
253  // Stride   : Stride_unit if parent Stride_unit*
254  //            Stride_unknown otherwise
255  // Cmplx    : Same
256
257  static dimension_type const dim = 1;
258
259  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::access_type access_type;
260  typedef row1_type                                 order_type;
261  typedef typename conditional<
262    Block_layout<BlockT>::pack_type::is_ct_unit_stride,
263    Stride_unit, Stride_unknown>::type pack_type;
264  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type complex_type;
265
266  typedef Layout<dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
267};
268
269// Store Redim_block by-value.
270template <typename BlockT, dimension_type Dim>
271struct View_block_storage<Redim_block<BlockT, Dim> >
272  : By_value_block_storage<Redim_block<BlockT, Dim> >
273{};
274
275/// Reduction to redimension an expression from x-dimensional (where x > 1)
276/// to 1-dimensional.
277///
278/// Transform expression block dimensions to 1, keeps dense blocks
279/// (which are 1,x-dimensional) as is, wraps other blocks with Redim_block.
280template <dimension_type NewDim>
281class Redim_expr
282{
283public:
284  template <typename BlockT>
285  struct leaf_node
286  {
287    typedef Redim_block<BlockT, Block_layout<BlockT>::dim> type;
288  };
289
290  template <dimension_type Dim0,
291	    typename       T,
292	    typename       OrderT,
293	    typename       MapT>
294  struct leaf_node<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT> >
295  {
296    typedef Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT> type;
297  };
298
299  template <dimension_type Dim0,
300	    typename       T,
301	    typename       OrderT>
302  struct leaf_node<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_or_global_map<Dim0> > >
303  {
304    typedef Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_map> type;
305  };
306
307  template <dimension_type Dim0,
308	    typename       T>
309  struct leaf_node<expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> >
310  {
311    typedef expr::Scalar<NewDim, T> type;
312  };
313
314  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
315  struct unary_node
316  {
317    typedef expr::Unary<O, B, true> const type;
318  };
319
320  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
321	    typename LBlock,
322	    typename RBlock>
323  struct binary_node
324  {
325    typedef expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const type;
326  };
327
328  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
329	    typename Block1,
330	    typename Block2,
331	    typename Block3>
332  struct ternary_node
333  {
334    typedef expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const type;
335  };
336
337  template <typename BlockT>
338  struct transform
339  {
340    typedef typename leaf_node<BlockT>::type type;
341  };
342
343  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
344  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
345  {
346    typedef typename unary_node<O, typename transform<B>::type>::type
347    type;
348  };
349
350  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
351	    typename LBlock,
352	    typename RBlock>
353  struct transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>
354  {
355    typedef typename binary_node<Operation,
356				 typename transform<LBlock>::type,
357				 typename transform<RBlock>::type>
358    ::type type;
359  };
360
361  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
362	    typename Block1,
363	    typename Block2,
364	    typename Block3>
365  struct transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>
366  {
367    typedef typename ternary_node<Operation,
368				  typename transform<Block1>::type,
369				  typename transform<Block2>::type,
370				  typename transform<Block3>::type>
371    ::type type;
372  };
373
374
375  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
376  typename transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>::type
377  apply(expr::Unary<O, B, true> const &b)
378  {
379    typedef typename transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>::type
380      block_type;
381    return block_type(b.operation(), apply(const_cast<B&>(b.arg())));
382  }
383
384  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
385	    typename LBlock,
386	    typename RBlock>
387  typename transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>::type
388  apply(expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const& blk)
389  {
390    typedef typename
391      transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>::type
392        block_type;
393    return block_type(apply(const_cast<LBlock&>(blk.arg1())),
394		      apply(const_cast<RBlock&>(blk.arg2())));
395  }
396
397  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
398	    typename Block1,
399	    typename Block2,
400	    typename Block3>
401  typename transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>::type
402  apply(expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const& blk)
403  {
404    typedef typename
405      transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>::type
406        block_type;
407    return block_type(apply(const_cast<Block1&>(blk.arg1())),
408		      apply(const_cast<Block2&>(blk.arg2())),
409		      apply(const_cast<Block3&>(blk.arg3())));
410  }
411
412  // Leaf combine function for Dense.
413  template <dimension_type Dim0,
414	    typename       T,
415	    typename       OrderT,
416	    typename       MapT>
417  // typename transform<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT> >::type&
418  Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT>&
419  apply(Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT>& block) const
420  {
421    return block;
422  }
423
424  template <dimension_type Dim0,
425	    typename       T,
426	    typename       OrderT>
427  // typename transform<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_or_global_map<Dim0> > >::type&
428  Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_map>&
429  apply(Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_or_global_map<Dim0> >& block) const
430  {
431    return block.get_local_block();
432  }
433
434  // Leaf combine function for expr::Scalar.
435  template <dimension_type Dim0,
436	    typename       T>
437  typename transform<expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> >::type
438  apply(expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> & block) const
439  {
440    return expr::Scalar<NewDim, T>(block.value());
441  }
442
443
444  // Leaf combine function.
445  template <typename BlockT>
446  typename transform<BlockT>::type
447  apply(BlockT& block) const
448  {
449    typedef typename transform<BlockT>::type block_type;
450    return block_type(block);
451  }
452
453  // Constructors.
454public:
455  Redim_expr() {}
456};
457
458} // namespace vsip::impl
459} // namespace vsip
